data.title: PayPal among the top payment methods accepted with retailers
data.description: PayPal is the fifth most popular payment method retailers accept as of August 2019. Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover Card round out the top 5, respectively, with the majority of online retailers in Internet Retailers 2019 Top 1000 accepting these forms of payment.

data.title: Yummly integrates Amazon cookware into its app
data.description: Yummly’s iPhone app users will see related cooking products they can buy on Amazon while they are looking at recipes.

data.title: 40% of new Pinterest users are men
data.description: Pinterest says it has 150 million active monthly users.

data.title: E-commerce vendor mParticle raises $17.5 million
data.description: MParticle unifies data that retailers collect across analytics and marketing programs, the web and apps.

data.title: Joybird adds new AR tool to its mobile app
data.description: At least 70% of Joybird’s web traffic comes from mobile devices, according to Gerardo Ornelas, the brand’s vice president and general manager. Recognizing the trend, Joybird seized on the opportunity to better serve its online shoppers with the new mobile functionality, he said.
